metadata.synopsis: Dialogue of a regular thug - member of the Rivington Rats band associated with the Guild. They were hired to protect the merchant's caravan.

0.speaker: Dimples Backster
0.text: And still you're staring at me.
0.context: NodeContext: Still bored but now a little exasperated

1.speaker: Dimples Backster
1.text: Didn't whatever birthed you tell you not to stare?
1.context: NodeContext: Somewhat threatening but mostly bored
